electricidad.texto:
Our electricians are experts 
 in the installation, maintenance 
 and  repair of any type 
 of electrical installation.
electricidad.carta1: We install all types of plugs, whether surface plugs or built-in outlets.
electricidad.carta2: We install all the wall or ceiling lamps that exist on the market, even outdoors.
electricidad.carta3: We are experts in the assembly and wiring of distribution panels, always guaranteeing 100% safety.
electricidad.carta4: We install all the light points that your home needs and carry out switched light installations.

fontaneria.texto:
We solve pipe and drain blockages, 
 repair leaks and take care of 
 any type of plumbing installation.
fontaneria.carta1: Specialists in detecting and repairing water leaks in the fastest and most economical way.
fontaneria.carta2: We install the drains that your kitchen and bathroom appliances and utensils need.
fontaneria.carta3: We install or replace copper plumbing, heating or gas pipes in your home or business.
fontaneria.carta4: We install heating in your home or business, whether gas, electric or diesel.

paleteria.texto:
We offer a renovation service 
 both indoors and outdoors, 
 personalized and adapted 
 to your needs and budget.
paleteria.carta1: We change bathtubs for shower trays and install or renovate your bathroom for functionality and elegance.
paleteria.carta2: We advise, carry out the transport and installation of all the elements of the kitchen of your dreams.
paleteria.carta3: We are experts in the renovation or installation of tile, laminate, epoxy resin, vinyl and painted floors.
paleteria.carta4: We design and build terraces in multiple materials to renew the garden of your home.

carpinteria.texto:
Our carpenters are experts in 
 the installation, maintenance and 
 repair of any type of wooden 
 or aluminum structure.
carpinteria.carta1: We help you with transportation or we design and assemble all the furniture for your home, office, premises or business.
carpinteria.carta2: We design and carry out installations of all types of structures in wood and aluminum.
carpinteria.carta3: We maintain the wood of your furniture or repair wood that has been damaged by external agents.
carpinteria.carta4: We install or renew your doors with solid wood doors, solid core doors, hollow core doors or aluminum doors.
carpinteria.carta5: We install or renew your windows with solid wood, solid core, hollow core or aluminum windows.

pintura.texto:
Perfect finishes, speed, 
 seriousness and good price 
 make our painting service 
 the best on the market.
pintura.carta1: Andrade Serveis offers a wide range of styles, designs, textures, effects and colors for the interior.
pintura.carta2: Specialists in stone or acrylic coatings for the durability and protection of your exteriors.
pintura.carta3: We achieve the best finish for your walls with our catalog of stuccoes, both plastic and acrylic.
pintura.carta4: We repair and smooth walls damaged by cracks, humidity or dripping so that they can be painted.

limpieza.texto:
For more than 20 years we 
 have been offering the best 
 range of hygiene and cleaning 
 services for your facilities.
limpieza.carta1: Professional thorough cleaning or vacuuming of flats and houses, inhabited or rented, in a single day.
limpieza.carta2: We adapt to the schedules and needs of your office to guarantee absolute cleaning and disinfection.
limpieza.carta3: Thanks to our 24-hour cleaning service, we can take care of your premises at any time of the day.
limpieza.carta4: We offer services by the hour or fixed daily template for the cleaning and disinfection of your company or business.
limpieza.carta5: Impeccable gardens with our cleaning and maintenance service always respecting the environment.
limpieza.carta6: Cleaning and disinfection of toilets for large stores, shopping centers, restaurants or nightclubs.

mudanzas.texto:
We provide an economical, 
 fast and professional service for 
 moving, shipping and transporting 
 merchandise throughout Catalonia.
mudanzas.carta1: Fast and safe services to carry out emergency transfers in the shortest time possible.
mudanzas.carta2: Fast and safe services to carry out emergency transfers in the shortest time possible.
mudanzas.carta3: We are specialized in moving services throughout the province of Barcelona for individuals and companies.

informatica.texto:
We have the best computer 
 maintenance service for companies 
 and individuals, technical assistance 
 and computer emergencies.
informatica.carta1: We specialize in web page design with a modern, functional and professional design.
informatica.carta2: With our SEO service we ensure that your website appears in the top positions on Google.
informatica.carta3: We solve any SSOO installation and configuration problem, or in software and components.
